description: Test attachments for both content extraction AND custom backgrounds
user_input: Analyze this research paper about renewable energy innovations.

expected_behavior.content_extraction: PDF processed for text content via OCR
expected_behavior.background_images: Images 2-8 used as slide backgrounds (7 images for 7 slides)

expected_behavior.graceful_handling: Perfect image count after content extraction
